key_risks: Profitability challenges with significant net losses and adjusted EBITDA losses
High competition in the home insurance market from established and tech-driven players
Regulatory risks due to evolving state-level insurance regulations
Dependence on technology and potential disruptions or vulnerabilities
High customer acquisition costs impacting financial scalability
controversies: Ongoing financial losses despite improvements in operational efficiency
Reliance on reinsurance partners introduces dependencies and potential vulnerabilities
social_issues: Data privacy concerns due to reliance on technology and data analytics
governance_issues: Transparency in investor relations, though stock performance and growth hurdles remain concerns
